page.title: 21Roseberry Square
page.content:
Roseberry Square and the Courts estate were demolished in 2002.

At the time, the then Mayor, Councillor Vilma Collins said "I'm absolutely delighted. Nothing gave me greater pleasure than destroying those monstrosities."

The replacement development is 31,000sq ft and cost Â£4m. Currently occupied by a Netto supermarket, Ladbrokes bookmakers, a pharmacy, a Sainsburys local store, a Dominos Pizzeria, fish and chips shop and replacement Library.

A replacement pub and post office were not built
Chris Twigg
